item.description: store and retrieve flight path info

item.name: 8. Fly-Safe Reporting - User Airspace Info
item.description: API's that provide user based information about Airspaces or geospacial info: SFOC's, IFR, Jurisdictions, etc

request.description: Create the AirMarket Approved Aerial Assets report.

item.name: 2. AirSpaces - Get Aviation Data API's
item.description: These are the API's used by the AirMarket mobile applications.  These are used to return all required data to the current mobile clients.

request.description:
This API performs a Airspace Assessment for the provided location, altitude, username and returns the an Asessment Status with associated Airport & Airspace information. 

The parameters is seup for evaluating downtown Calgary.

This API is returns the Airprots within the provided radius.  The parameters are set to query the calgary downtown area.  

The parameters is seup for evaluating downtown Calgary.

This API returns the AirSpace info that intersects with the provided location & radius distance.  

The parameters is seup for evaluating downtown Calgary.

This API returns the specific Flight Information Region (FIR) associated with the specific location provided. 

The parameters is seup for evaluating downtown Calgary.
